problem_names:
lemma dim_submatrix: "dim_row (submatrix A I J) = card {i. i<dim_row A \<and> i\<in>I}"
                     "dim_col (submatrix A I J) = card {j. j<dim_col A \<and> j\<in>J}"

lemma submatrix_index:
assumes "i<card {i. i<dim_row A \<and> i\<in>I}"
assumes "j<card {j. j<dim_col A \<and> j\<in>J}"
shows "submatrix A I J $$ (i,j) = A $$ (pick I i, pick J j)"
lemma set_le_in:"{a. a < n \<and> a \<in> I} = {a \<in> I. a < n}"

lemma submatrix_index_card:
assumes "i<dim_row A" "j<dim_col A" "i\<in>I" "j\<in>J"
shows "submatrix A I J $$ (card {a\<in>I. a < i}, card {a\<in>J. a < j}) = A $$ (i, j)"
lemma submatrix_split: "submatrix A I J = submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV"
translations:
lemma dim_submatrix: "dim_row (submatrix A I J) = card {i. i<dim_row A \<and> i\<in>I}"
                     "dim_col (submatrix A I J) = card {j. j<dim_col A \<and> j\<in>J}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dim_row (submatrix A I J) = card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I} &&&
    dim_col (submatrix A I J) = card {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J}
unfolding submatrix_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dim_row
     (mat (card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I})
       (card {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J})
       (\<lambda>(i, j). A $$ (pick I i, pick J j))) =
    card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I} &&&
    dim_col
     (mat (card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I})
       (card {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J})
       (\<lambda>(i, j). A $$ (pick I i, pick J j))) =
    card {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J}
by simp_all

lemma submatrix_index:
assumes "i<card {i. i<dim_row A \<and> i\<in>I}"
assumes "j<card {j. j<dim_col A \<and> j\<in>J}"
shows "submatrix A I J $$ (i,j) = A $$ (pick I i, pick J j)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) = A $$ (pick I i, pick J j)
unfolding submatrix_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. mat (card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I})
     (card {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J})
     (\<lambda>(i, j). A $$ (pick I i, pick J j)) $$
    (i, j) =
    A $$ (pick I i, pick J j)
by (simp add: assms(1) assms(2))
lemma set_le_in:"{a. a < n \<and> a \<in> I} = {a \<in> I. a < n}"
by meson

lemma submatrix_index_card:
assumes "i<dim_row A" "j<dim_col A" "i\<in>I" "j\<in>J"
shows "submatrix A I J $$ (card {a\<in>I. a < i}, card {a\<in>J. a < j}) = A $$ (i, j)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. submatrix A I J $$ (card {a \<in> I. a < i}, card {a \<in> J. a < j}) =
    A $$ (i, j)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. submatrix A I J $$ (card {a \<in> I. a < i}, card {a \<in> J. a < j}) =
    A $$ (i, j)

have "i = pick I (card {a\<in>I. a < i})"
       "j = pick J (card {a\<in>J. a < j})"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. i = pick I (card {a \<in> I. a < i}) &&&
    j = pick J (card {a \<in> J. a < j})
using pick_card_in_set assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i \<in> ?I \<Longrightarrow> pick ?I (card {a \<in> ?I. a < ?i}) = ?i
  i < dim_row A
  j < dim_col A
  i \<in> I
  j \<in> J

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. i = pick I (card {a \<in> I. a < i}) &&&
    j = pick J (card {a \<in> J. a < j})
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  i = pick I (card {a \<in> I. a < i})
  j = pick J (card {a \<in> J. a < j})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. submatrix A I J $$ (card {a \<in> I. a < i}, card {a \<in> J. a < j}) =
    A $$ (i, j)

have "{a\<in>I. a < i} \<subset> {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I}"
       "{a\<in>J. a < j} \<subset> {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {a \<in> I. a < i} \<subset> {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I} &&&
    {a \<in> J. a < j} \<subset> {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J}
unfolding set_le_in

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {a \<in> I. a < i} \<subset> {i \<in> I. i < dim_row A} &&&
    {a \<in> J. a < j} \<subset> {j \<in> J. j < dim_col A}
using \<open>i<dim_row A\<close> \<open>j<dim_col A\<close> Collect_mono less_imp_le less_le_trans \<open>i\<in>I\<close> \<open>j\<in>J\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  i < dim_row A
  j < dim_col A
  (\<And>x. ?P x \<longrightarrow> ?Q x) \<Longrightarrow>
  Collect ?P \<subseteq> Collect ?Q
  ?x < ?y \<Longrightarrow> ?x \<le> ?y
  \<lbrakk>?x < ?y; ?y \<le> ?z\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> ?x < ?z
  i \<in> I
  j \<in> J

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {a \<in> I. a < i} \<subset> {i \<in> I. i < dim_row A} &&&
    {a \<in> J. a < j} \<subset> {j \<in> J. j < dim_col A}
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  {a \<in> I. a < i} \<subset> {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I}
  {a \<in> J. a < j} \<subset> {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. submatrix A I J $$ (card {a \<in> I. a < i}, card {a \<in> J. a < j}) =
    A $$ (i, j)
then

have "card {a\<in>I. a < i} < card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I}"
            "card {a\<in>J. a < j} < card {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J}"
by (simp_all add: psubset_card_mono)

proof (state)
this:
  card {a \<in> I. a < i} < card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I}
  card {a \<in> J. a < j} < card {j. j < dim_col A \<and> j \<in> J}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. submatrix A I J $$ (card {a \<in> I. a < i}, card {a \<in> J. a < j}) =
    A $$ (i, j)
then
show ?thesis
using \<open>i = pick I (card {a \<in> I. a < i})\<close> \<open>j = pick J (card {a \<in> J. a < j})\<close> submatrix_index
by fastforce

proof (state)
this:
  submatrix A I J $$ (card {a \<in> I. a < i}, card {a \<in> J. a < j}) =
  A $$ (i, j)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma submatrix_split: "submatrix A I J = submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. submatrix A I J = submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV
proof (rule eq_matI)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>i j.
       \<lbrakk>i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV);
        j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) =
                         submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV $$ (i, j)
 2. dim_row (submatrix A I J) =
    dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)
 3. dim_col (submatrix A I J) =
    dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)
show "dim_row (submatrix A I J) = dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dim_row (submatrix A I J) =
    dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)
by (simp add: dim_submatrix(1))

proof (state)
this:
  dim_row (submatrix A I J) =
  dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>i j.
       \<lbrakk>i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV);
        j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) =
                         submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV $$ (i, j)
 2. dim_col (submatrix A I J) =
    dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)
show "dim_col (submatrix A I J) = dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dim_col (submatrix A I J) =
    dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)
by (simp add: dim_submatrix(2))

proof (state)
this:
  dim_col (submatrix A I J) =
  dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>i j.
       \<lbrakk>i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV);
        j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) =
                         submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV $$ (i, j)
fix i j

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>i j.
       \<lbrakk>i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV);
        j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) =
                         submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV $$ (i, j)
assume ij_le:"i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)" "j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)"

proof (state)
this:
  i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)
  j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>i j.
       \<lbrakk>i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV);
        j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) =
                         submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV $$ (i, j)
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)
  j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)
have ij_le1:"i<card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I}" "j<card {i. i < dim_col A \<and> i \<in> J}"

proof (prove)
using this:
  i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)
  j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. i < card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> I} &&&
    j < card {i. i < dim_col A \<and> i \<in> J}
by (simp_all add: dim_submatrix)
then
have ij_le2:"i<card {i. i < dim_row (submatrix A UNIV J) \<and> i \<in> I}" "j<card {i. i < dim_col (submatrix A UNIV J) \<and> i \<in> UNIV}"
by (simp_all add: dim_submatrix)
then
have i_le3:"pick I i<card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> UNIV}"
using ij_le1(1) pick_le
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  pick I i < card {i. i < dim_row A \<and> i \<in> UNIV}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>i j.
       \<lbrakk>i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV);
        j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) =
                         submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV $$ (i, j)
have j_le3: "pick UNIV j<card {i. i < dim_col A \<and> i \<in> J}"
unfolding pick_UNIV
by (simp add: ij_le1(2))

proof (state)
this:
  pick UNIV j < card {i. i < dim_col A \<and> i \<in> J}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>i j.
       \<lbrakk>i < dim_row (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV);
        j < dim_col (submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) =
                         submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV $$ (i, j)
then
show "submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) = submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV $$ (i, j)"
unfolding submatrix_index[OF ij_le1] submatrix_index[OF ij_le2] submatrix_index[OF i_le3 j_le3]
unfolding pick_UNIV
by metis

proof (state)
this:
  submatrix A I J $$ (i, j) =
  submatrix (submatrix A UNIV J) I UNIV $$ (i, j)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
